import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' const Books = ({ show, books }) => { const [filter, setFilter] = useState('') const [filteredBooks, setFilteredBooks] = useState([]) const booksToShow = !filteredBooks ? books : filteredBooks console.log('filter', filter) useEffect(() => { setFilteredBooks(books.filter(b => b.genres.includes(filter))) }, [filter]) // eslint-disable-line if (!show) { return null } return (

books

{booksToShow.map(a => )}
author published
{a.title} {a.author.name} {a.published}
) } export default Books
